adm:managed-object.name: smtp-alert-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
may be used to send e-mail messages to notify administrators of significant events that occur within the server.

adm:property.name: sender-address
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the email address to use as the sender for messages generated by this alert handler.

adm:property.name: recipient-address
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies an email address to which the messages should be sent.
adm:property.adm:description: Multiple values may be provided if there should be more than one recipient.

adm:property.name: message-subject
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the subject that should be used for email messages generated by this alert handler.
adm:property.adm:description: The token "%%%%alert-type%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert type string. The token "%%%%alert-id%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert ID value. The token "%%%%alert-message%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert message. The token "\\n" is replaced with an end-of-line marker.

adm:property.name: message-body
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the body that should be used for email messages generated by this alert handler.
adm:property.adm:description: The token "%%%%alert-type%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert type string. The token "%%%%alert-id%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert ID value. The token "%%%%alert-message%%%%" is dynamically replaced with the alert message. The token "\\n" is replaced with an end-of-line marker.
